verbs.description: [ARG1: Jack Johnson] [V: was] [ARG2: the first black boxing heavyweight champion of the world] , [ARGM-ADV: defeating Tommy Burns for the title in 1908] . His family wants his 1913 conviction to be pardoned by President Donald Trump .

[ARG0: Jack Johnson] was the first black boxing heavyweight champion of the world , [V: defeating] [ARG1: Tommy Burns] [ARG2: for the title] [ARGM-TMP: in 1908] . His family wants his 1913 conviction to be pardoned by President Donald Trump .

Jack Johnson was the first black boxing heavyweight champion of the world , defeating Tommy Burns for the title in 1908 . [ARG0: His family] [V: wants] [ARG1: his 1913 conviction to be pardoned by President Donald Trump] .

Jack Johnson was the first black boxing heavyweight champion of the world , defeating Tommy Burns for the title in 1908 . His family wants his 1913 conviction to [V: be] pardoned by President Donald Trump .
